====Macrovision's Fred Amoroso====
====Macrovision's Fred Amoroso====
â
CEO and President of [[Macrovision Corporation]] Fred Amoroso posted his own open letter in response to Steve Jobs's. In his reply, Amoroso argued that DRM increases both consumer value and electronic distribution by giving users choices (e.g. rent vs. buy). He also argues in favor of interoperable and open DRM.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.macrovision.com/company/1430_5331.htm |title=Article & Reviews - Macrovision |publisher=Macrovision.com |date= |accessdate=2008-09-13}} {{Dead link|date=September 2010|bot=H3llBot}}</ref>
+
CEO and President of [[Macrovision Corporation]] Fred Amoroso posted his own open letter in response to Steve Jobs's. In his reply, Amoroso argued that DRM increases both consumer value and electronic distribution by giving users choices (e.g. rent vs. buy). He also argues in favor of interoperable and "open" DRM.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.macrovision.com/company/1430_5331.htm |title=Article & Reviews - Macrovision |publisher=Macrovision.com |date= |accessdate=2008-09-13}} {{Dead link|date=September 2010|bot=H3llBot}}</ref>
